name: @cryptohub/coco
description: Modern CSS framework based on Flexbox

scripts.prepare: yarn global add gulp-cli; echo 'Checking presence of libsass (required >3.5.0)'; node_modules/.bin/node-sass -v
scripts.build: yarn build-add-version && yarn build-clean && yarn build-css && yarn build-autoprefix && yarn build-cleancss && yarn build-scss && yarn build-sass && yarn build-default-vars && yarn build-clean-version
scripts.build-add-version:
printf '.coco.version::after
  content: "%s"

' $npm_package_version | cat - style/coco.sass > style/coco.sass.old && mv style/coco.sass.old style/coco.sass
scripts.build-docs: gulp scss-docs && gulp docs && rm -rf dist/docs
scripts.pack: VER=$(echo $npm_package_version | sed s/[.]/-/g) && mv dist coco-v$npm_package_version && zip -r coco-v$VER.zip coco-v$npm_package_version && mv coco-v$npm_package_version dist
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn build-docs && yarn compress
